title.rendered: HSP Roll R Cover Series 3  Dual Cab – VW Amarok 2011+ (Including Factory Extended Ultimate Style Sports Bar Adapter Kit)

content.rendered:
HSP Roll R Cover Series 3 Dual Cab – VW Amarok 2011+ (Including Factory Extended Ultimate Style Sports Bar Adapter Kit)

The VW Dual Cab Electric Roll with Sports Bar Mounting Kit to suit Amarok, Sportline & Highline is the ultimate accessory to enhance your vehicle’s potential.

Now available for order through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

For the right Load Bar Kit, please contact one of our team member.

HSP is 100% Australian made and owned
Open, close, and pause in any position.
Heavy-duty aluminium
Full width integrated LED Strip Light
Built-in AI technology servicing warning light
Compatible with Sports bar

Operate via touch sensor built into side rail
Alternatively, operate via factory vehicle remote
Or operate via HSP Smart App (Andriod and Apple)
And finally, operate via voice command (using SIRI)
100% Curtain retraction (maximizing tub space)
Small compact canister
Mannix black premium black finish

PLEASE NOTE: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.

excerpt.rendered:

(Including Factory Extended Ultimate Style Sports Bar Adapter Kit)
